mapper.select: SELECT A.EXAM_SN, A.EXAM_NUMBER, A.EXAM_TITLE, A.EXAM_ANSWER, A.EXAM_TYPE, A.EXAM_CONTENT, A.EXAM_INFO_CD FROM EXAM A, EXAM_INFO B WHERE A.EXAM_INFO_CD = B.EXAM_INFO_CD AND A.EXAM_SN = #{examSn}

SELECT A.EXAM_INFO_CD, A.EXAM_INFO_TITLE, A.EXAM_INFO_CATEGORY, A.EXAM_INFO_DATE, A.EXAM_INFO_CONTENT, A.ESTBL_COURS_CD, A.EXAM_INFO_TIMELIMIT FROM EXAM_INFO A, STDNT B, MAJOR C, ESTBL_COURS D WHERE A.ESTBL_COURS_CD = D.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND D.MAJOR_CODE = C.MAJOR_CODE AND C.MAJOR_CODE = B.MAJOR_CODE AND B.MBER_NO = #{mberNo}
select level num from dual connect by level < 21 minus select exam_number ext from exam where exam_info_cd = #{examInfoCd}

SELECT E.EXAM_SN, E.EXAM_NUMBER, E.EXAM_TITLE, E.EXAM_ANSWER, E.EXAM_TYPE, E.EXAM_CONTENT, E.EXAM_INFO_CD FROM EXAM_INFO A, STDNT B, MAJOR C, ESTBL_COURS D, EXAM E WHERE A.ESTBL_COURS_CD = D.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND D.MAJOR_CODE = C.MAJOR_CODE AND C.MAJOR_CODE = B.MAJOR_CODE AND A.EXAM_INFO_CD = E.EXAM_INFO_CD AND B.MBER_NO = #{mberNo} AND E.EXAM_INFO_CD = #{examInfoCd} ORDER BY EXAM_NUMBER ASC
mapper.insert: insert into exam(EXAM_SN, EXAM_NUMBER, EXAM_TITLE, EXAM_ANSWER, EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_CONTENT, EXAM_INFO_CD) values('E'||SEQ_EXAM.nextval, #{examNumber}, #{examTitle}, #{examAnswer}, #{examType}, #{examContent}, #{examInfoCd})

insert into exam_info(EXAM_INFO_CD, EXAM_INFO_TITLE, EXAM_INFO_CATEGORY, EXAM_INFO_DATE, EXAM_INFO_CONTENT, ESTBL_COURS_CD, EXAM_INFO_TIMELIMIT) values('EF'||SEQ_EXAMINFO.nextval, #{examInfoTitle}, #{examInfoCategory}, #{examInfoDate}, #{examInfoContent}, #{estblCoursCd}, #{examInfoTimelimit})
mapper.update: UPDATE EXAM_INFO SET EXAM_INFO_TITLE = #{examInfoTitle}, EXAM_INFO_CATEGORY = #{examInfoCategory}, EXAM_INFO_DATE = #{examInfoDate}, EXAM_INFO_CONTENT = #{examInfoContent}, EXAM_INFO_TIMELIMIT = #{examInfoTimelimit} WHERE EXAM_INFO_CD = #{examInfoCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXAM_RESULT(EXAM_RESULT_SN, EXAM_INPUT, MBER_NO, EXAM_NUMBER, EXAM_SN) VALUES(SEQ_EXAMRESULT.nextval, #{examInput}, #{mberNo}, #{examNumber}, #{examSn})
